tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: I would suggest this doctor. My father suffers from high blood pressure. So we went to some other doctor suggested by our relatives. However, his medications didn't work at all and BP was still high. Then I referred to this doctor in Practo. Dr. Sanjib K Sahu is well experienced, patient and prompt responder. He patiently listened to the issue and helped us in understanding the sudden rise of the BP. He also suggested medicines which were much similar to what my father was using since the last few years. He became stable now. Kindly visit him if you have hyper tension. He will help you immediately.

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,
review: My grandfathers go to doctor for hypertension..** ** *** **** .. speaks well explains well and treats well !
Very experienced doctor.Intelligent enough to understand and handle your problem.He handled our problem very promptly.
